contentList.content: Wisdom +2. Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">ability check</LSTag>.
After dealing damage by spell, add your <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Charisma Modifier</LSTag> to damage of Weapon Attack in this turn.
Add your <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Charisma Modifier</LSTag> to damage of Weapon Attack.
After dealing damage by weapon attack, add your <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Strength Modifier</LSTag> to Spell damage in this turn.
Add your <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Strength Modifier</LSTag> to Spell damage in this turn.
When you're <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FLANKED">threaten</LSTag>, add your Charisma Modifier to spell damage.

Throw an ice block, deal [1] to the main target. Then it will leave a puddle of water on the ground, and may deal [2] to all creatures in the area if they fail the dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>.
Summons a magical circle for 5 turns: deals [1] damage each turn within the area, and all targets are inflicted with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="Witcher_SLOW">Slowed</LSTag>.

While in the<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="Boost_CS_SoulReap_Riposte">Riposte</LSTag>state, enemies you counterattack are<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">prone</LSTag>. After making an off-hand melee weapon attack, you may spend 1 Reaction to make an additional off-hand melee weapon attack.
本回合已发动剑舞, 减少1次反应机会.
While wearing light armor or no armor, gain 1 additional Reaction ActionPoint. If Master Swordsman is active, gain +2 AC while in shadow.

When you are in Shadow Concealment, you can teleport next to an enemy to make a melee weapon attack with your main hand. Additionally, if you use this skill at the start of your turn, the farther the target is from you, the more bonus damage you deal, up to +10.

Make a melee weapon attack with your main hand. Targets affected by Lethal Poison must make a Constitution Saving Throw; on a failure, they become Petrified for 2 turn.If target was killed,return all of vitality.

The founder of snake school was famous for his precognition. And the snake witchers have been studying on the Wild Hunt and the doom of white frost.
You can avoid an attack from an enemy once per short rest.

Add your <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Wisdom Modifier</LSTag> to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>. At the start of combat, gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_GISH_ARCANE_ACUITY">Arcane Acuity</LSTag>, stacks equal to your Wisdom Modifier.
Gain Poison resistance and ignore Poison resistance.

Drop a virulent bomb which will leave a poison cloud. Targets must make Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>. If they fail, they suffer from 2 <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BIBBERBANG_FUMES">Poison Fumes</LSTag>. and make a Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">SavingThrow</LSTag>, if failed, Appy 3 <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_POISON_POISON_LETHALITY">Lethality Poison</LSTag> to target.
Once per turn, aftering killing an enemy, you get <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CS_wolf_HASTE">Greed</LSTag>.
You gain an additional <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ActionPoint">Action Point</LSTag> and 2 damage bonus.

After attack, make an <LSTag Tooltip="Investigation">Investigation</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SkillCheck">skill check</LSTag>. If succeed, the target will be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CS_MonsterLore_debuff">Known</LSTag>.
If there are at least 2 enemies near you at the start of your turn, improve your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> and damage roll by [1] in this turn.
Whenever you get damaged, gain 1 stack of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CS_Berserker_Buff">Fury</LSTag>.
For each stack, your <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>+1. Stackable.
Deal a weapon attack to all enemies around you.

Rush to an enemy and deal damage equal to 3 times of your Constitution Modifiers. May make the target <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">prone</LSTag> if it fails the Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>.
